sentences.en: A new technology, paper mill sludge incineration in fluidized bed ( FB ) is being developed.
sentences.cn: 研究了造纸污泥的 流化床 焚烧新技术.

sentences.en: At present, the main method of sludge disposal is landfill, composting and incineration of three farm.
sentences.cn: 目前, 污泥的处置方法主要是填埋 、 堆肥农用和焚烧三种.

sentences.en: Calorific value is the important parameter for incineration process and equipment design.
sentences.cn: 热值是焚烧工艺、设备设计的重要参数.

sentences.en: Dioxins are unwanted byproducts of some industrial processes and waste incineration.
sentences.cn: 二恶英是一些工业过程和废物焚化的有害副产品。

sentences.en: Finally, the result of recycling study of the incineration residue.
sentences.cn: 还介绍了焚烧炉渣再利用的研究成果.

sentences.en: In addition, the site can provide the space for incineration and the off - site incineration involves - distance transport.
sentences.cn: 此外该场地不能提供场内焚烧需要的空间,而场外焚烧需要长距离的运输.

sentences.en: Incineration cannot, of course, eliminate landfilling.
sentences.cn: 焚化当然不可能避免掩埋.

sentences.en: Incineration now increases damage instead of critical strike chance.
sentences.cn: 焚化现在提升伤害而非提升致命一击率.

sentences.en: Incineration or flaring, is used when an organic pollutant can be oxidized to CO 2 and water.
sentences.cn: 若有机污染物可被氧化成二氧化碳和水, 就使用焚化或燃烧的方法.

sentences.en: Keywords: strategy, sustainability, reuse, landfill, incineration, agricultural application, melting.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 处置策略 、 永续性 、 再利用 、 卫生掩埋 、 焚化 、 农地利用 、 熔融.

sentences.en: Players will face Incineration from the Pillar Fire.
sentences.cn: 玩家将面对燃烧一切的火柱.

sentences.en: Projects involving nuclear energy, large - scale hydro - electric power and waste incineration do not contribute to sustainability.
sentences.cn: 核能 、 大规模水电和废物焚烧的项目无助于可持续发展.

sentences.en: Senior middle school or above with 2 years' operating experience in incineration plant, power or cogeneration plant, chemical plant. Or.
sentences.cn: 高中及以上学历：焚化厂、热电厂或化工厂2年以上生产操作工作经验；

sentences.en: Sludge incineration is a frequently employed disposed method.
sentences.cn: 污泥焚烧也是一种常用的处置方法.

sentences.en: The conventional types of air pollution control system is direct - fired incineration, liquid absorption - stripping , active carbon adsorption.
sentences.cn: 涂装车间目前治理废气常用的方法有:直接燃烧法 、 液体吸收法 、 活性炭吸附法.

sentences.en: There's also dioxin, a byproduct of paper manufacture and waste incineration.
sentences.cn: 还有二恶英, 纸生产和废物燃烧的副产物.

sentences.en: Very few plants have provisions for the separate disposal of grease to scavengers or by incineration.
sentences.cn: 几乎没有工厂采用清除器对油脂进行分别处置，或采用焚化进行处置的措施。

sentences.en: Whereas , Sludge disposal technologies include incineration, land filling, land application and building materials.
sentences.cn: 污泥处置技术主要有焚烧 、 填埋 、 土地利用、建材利用等.
